import{createClient}from'@supabase/supabase-js';const supabaseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL;const supabaseAnonKey=process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY;if(!supabaseUrl||!supabaseAnonKey){console.warn('Supabase credentials not found. Using mock data.');}export const supabase=supabaseUrl&&supabaseAnonKey?createClient(supabaseUrl,supabaseAnonKey):null;// Mock data for development when Supabase is not configured
export const useMockData=!supabase;
